metadata: {"name": "AmitDbha 1", "description": "AmitDbha is the buddha of comprehensive love. He lives in the West (represented as a meditating Buddha) and works for the enlightenment of all beings (represented as a blessing Buddha). His most important enlightenment technique is the visualization of the surrounding world as a paradise. Those who see his world as a paradise awaken his enlightenment energy. The world can be seen as a paradise by a corresponding positive thought (enlightenment thought) or by sending light to all beings (wish all beings to be happy). After the AmitDbha doctrine, one can come to paradise (in the Pure Land of AmitDbha), if they visualize at their death AmitDbha in the heaven (sun) over their head (western horizon),", "image": "ipfs://bafkreiajf7s5qkgiiukzpkmxmjeix7ibgcclelajf246toacrpngiy5fla", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "AmitDbha"}}
